name: StayClose
description:
In this 2-player game (it can be played with only 1 player) you have to control 2 players connected with a line. The line kills enemies, but don't go to far apart.
Multiplayer is local only.

This game is made with the LÖVE framework for the LÖVE Jam 2023.

Controls:
WASD for the red player
Arrow keys for the blue player
'M' to mute the music
'R' to restart

Credits:
Game maker: ThunderNL
Game tester: Niekz

Font: https://opengameart.org/content/boxy-bold-truetype-font
